entry.title: Twitter Faces EU Inquiry Over Failing to Moderate Illegal Content and Disinformation
entry.summary: The first-of-its-kind investigation will review whether Twitter did what it said it would do about Israel-Palestine content.

entry.title: Ubisoft's 'Champions Tactics' Ethereum NFTs Generate Millions After Free Mint
entry.summary: Following a drop that minted out in under 20 minutes, Ubisoft’s Warlords NFTs for Champions Tactics are reselling for $600 or more.

entry.title: UK Builds Digital Securities Sandbox to Test New Technolgies
entry.summary: The setup aims to house controlled testing of blockchain and other emerging infrastructure technologies before wider deployment.

entry.title: Solana Game 'Aurory' Suffers $830K Exploit, Disables Arbitrum Bridge
entry.summary: An exploit on Aurory's marketplace led to one user siphoning about 600,000 AURY tokens. The game's bridge is down while devs work on a fix.

entry.title: Bitwise Is First to Bitcoin ETF Ad Race With ‘Most Interesting Man in the World’
entry.summary: The message: "Bitwise Is Interesting.” It stars Jonathan Goldsmith, well-known for portraying “The Most Interesting Man in the World” in beer ads.

entry.title: Bitcoin Fees Continue to Surge Thanks to Ordinal Mania
entry.summary: It’s again very expensive to make a transaction on Bitcoin’s blockchain.

entry.title: The Next BONK? Solana Meme Coin Dogwifhat Pumps 2,000X in a Month
entry.summary: It’s a dog. With a hat. And the Solana token based on the dogwifhat meme is the latest to surge in value after BONK's boom.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds See 'Profit-Taking' Dip, But Investors Still Like Solana
entry.summary: Solana and other altcoin funds saw $21 million deposited last week.

entry.title: Helium Tokens Surge Amid Network Expansion, Solana Saga BONK Mania
entry.summary: Following Helium's nationwide U.S. rollout, the Solana-based tokens powering the decentralized 5G network have surged.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $41,000 as Crypto Price Rally Cools
entry.summary: The price slump comes as Bitcoin's average transaction fee has surged to a yearly high, driven by the growing popularity of Ordinals.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: BONK Simply Won’t Quit
entry.summary: The ever-ascendant Solana meme coin dominated Twitter discourse for yet another week, as inscriptions hobbled traffic on multiple layer 2 networks.

entry.title: The Biggest Games Coming Out in 2024
entry.summary: From Final Fantasy VII Rebirth to Star Wars Outlaws and plenty in between, these are our most anticipated games of 2024.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bonk Continues Surge With Solana Hype, Bitcoin Dips
entry.summary: Bitcoin and other major coins and tokens are down. But new meme coin BONK is still rallying.

entry.title: Voice Generating Startup Resemble AI Promises to Restore Old Audio
entry.summary: An AI startup has built a tool that it says can make low-fidelity speech recordings sound like new.

entry.title: Not That Grok: Musician Grimes and OpenAI Launch Plush Toy with AI Inside
entry.summary: Elon Musk’s ex partners with Curio to launch a line of AI-powered toys designed to cut back on screen time and enhance interaction.

entry.title: Jupiter Airdrop Set for January With a Billion JUP for Solana DeFi Users
entry.summary: Half of the 10 billion JUP supply will ultimately go to the Jupiter community, with 10% landing in Solana wallets during the first airdrop.

entry.title: Solana Weighs Demand for Saga Phones After Sellout Amid BONK Boom
entry.summary: The Saga is sold out in the U.S. and EU supplies are nearly tapped out. Solana Labs told Decrypt how it’s assessing next moves.

entry.title: Chinese Tech Giant Alibaba Unveils New AI Video Tool
entry.summary: Alibaba says its I2VGen-XL model can handle “visualization, sampling, training, inference, join training using images and videos, acceleration, and more.

entry.title: Twitch Walks Back Changes After Surge in Nudity: 'We Went Too Far'
entry.summary: This week, Twitch announced it would allow artistic nudity. Now, it’s blocked again, in part because of concerns around AI realism.

entry.title: Coinbase Plans to Challenge SEC Denial of Crypto Rulemaking Petition
entry.summary: The SEC today denied crypto exchange Coinbase's petition to clarify new crypto rules for the digital assets industry. Coinbase isn't taking "no" for an answer.

entry.title: Ethereum Scaler Arbitrum Suffers Outage—And Inscriptions Are to Blame
entry.summary: Arbitrum and other chains have recently been bombarded by users making "inscriptions" as on Bitcoin, even though such networks support NFTs.

entry.title: Gary Gensler: SEC 'Taking a New Look' at Bitcoin ETF Applications
entry.summary: The SEC chair stated that the regulator is reviewing spot Bitcoin ETF applications in light of a recent court ruling.

entry.title: BONK Spikes 101% Amid Solana Saga Sales Frenzy to Claim Airdrop
entry.summary: Solana-based meme coin BONK has continued to soar in value and hit new all-time highs—and the Saga smartphone is an unexpected beneficiary.

entry.title: SocialFi Startup Reach Aims to Improve Crypto Twitter With Anti-Bot Protocol
entry.summary: The latest addition to the "point" meta seeks to address the challenges of Crypto Twitter with the support of Seedphrase, Pranksy, Gmoney, and Zeneca.

entry.title: SafeMoon Files for Bankruptcy, SFM Token Crashes 50% to All-Time Low
entry.summary: The Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing comes after SafeMoon's founders were indicted by the DOJ for a "multi-million dollar international fraud scheme."

entry.title: Casio Drops Virtual G-Shock Watches as Ethereum NFTs—With Exclusive Perks
entry.summary: The G-Shock watch brand debuts a pair of fantastical digital designs on Ethereum, with a variety of special benefits for holders.

entry.title: Vatican Says AI Is the ‘Highest-Stakes Gamble of Our Future’
entry.summary: Pope Francis urged global leaders to work together to adopt a binding international treaty that regulates AI.

entry.title: Grindr Dating App Adds an AI ‘Wingman’ to Help Users Find Love
entry.summary: “If you’re not first to market with something in AI, you’re going to miss out," says Grindr CEO George Arison.

entry.title: Solana Devs Got a BONK Airdrop Worth $300 Last Christmas—It's Now Worth $500,000
entry.summary: Developers in LamportDAO received a gift of billions of BONK last year. It helped some pay rent—and others get crypto-rich (maybe).

entry.title: Instagram Adds Generative AI That Swaps Image Backgrounds
entry.summary: The green screen-like Backdrop feature lets users replace their messy kitchens with lush tropical forests.

entry.title: Native Bitcoin Staking on Ethereum and Solana Could Soon Be a Reality
entry.summary: Crypto startup Babylon says it's developed a way to stake Bitcoin on any proof-of-stake blockchain. Here's how it works.

entry.title: Solana DeFi Hacker Pleads Guilty in First-Ever Smart Contract Fraud Conviction
entry.summary: It's the "first ever conviction for such a hack,” according to the DOJ. The hacker will be sentenced in March.

entry.title: Did Michael Cohen Let AI Write His Legal Briefs?
entry.summary: Cohen's attorneys must prove the existence of cases they cited as speculation swirls around potential AI-generated content.

entry.title: Emerge 2023 Project of the Year: OpenAI ChatGPT 3.5
entry.summary: In barely over a year, ChatGPT rocketed from obscure, largely academic roots to the embodiment of a global revolution.

entry.title: Solana's BONK Becomes 69th Largest Coin as Market Cap Tops $1 Billion
entry.summary: BONK continues its recent boom with a 64% surge on the day, landing in the meme-friendly #69 spot on CoinGecko’s market ranking.

entry.title: Farcana Raises $10 Million for NFT Esports Shooter That Pays Out Bitcoin
entry.summary: Exclusive: The sci-fi, team-based hero shooter Farcana is still in early development. Now, it has a fresh round of capital to tap into.

entry.title: How a Single Phishing Link Unleashed Chaos on Crypto
entry.summary: Ledger has confirmed the attack began because “a former Ledger employee fell victim to a phishing attack.”

entry.title: Creating peaceful money & taking over your local government w/ Joseph Schiarizzi
entry.summary:
This week our host Reza Jafery is joined by Joseph Schiarizzi, founder of OpenDollar and prolific solidity developer.
We discuss: - Onchain beer - Taking over your local government - His Emmy and 3 patents?!?

entry.title: INTERVIEW: Ember Sword CEO Says NFT Games Are More 'Transparent'
entry.summary: Ember Sword CEO Mark Laursen shares why some big game studios "irk" him—and why he got into game development.

entry.title: Director Jordan Bayne on the State of Film3
entry.summary: At the 2023 Film3 Summit, Jordan Bayne—director and founder of The Squad—spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz about how the Film3 world has progressed over the last year and what decentralized technologies can offer to creators that want to buck the Hollywood system.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Phil Mohun
entry.summary:
Bright Moments co-founder Phil Mohun joins 5 Questions With SCENE to recount some favorite moments from the road, including negotiating with Patagonian gauchos, falling in love with Tokyo, and gaining a newfound appreciation for shrooms chocolate bars.
Shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Are NFTs Ever Coming Back?
entry.summary: In this weeks episode we sit down with Cashtro from Arcade.xyz to discuss NFTs, shitcoins, what collections have held onto their floor prices, and more.

entry.title: Web Summit: Will Web3 Gaming Ever be Mainstream?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung, EndeavorXR CEO Amy Peck and Gamee co-founder CEO Bozena Rezab joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves on stage at Web Summit to talk about the future of Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!
In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme.
They discuss - How to sell feet pics - If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems - the intersections between crypto and sex work
